alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 4:12PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Thomas and southwestern Brooks Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 412 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boston, or 12 miles northeast of Monticello, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Boston, Pidcock, Dixie, Grooverville, Everett, Newark, Eason, Oaklawn and Metcalf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
